title: Facebook and Instagram Messaging Functions Are Down
sub_head: Spokeswoman says company is working to get the popular chat tools back up
body:
The messaging functions on Facebook and Instagram are suffering from an outage on Wednesday, according to a company spokeswoman.
“We’re aware that some people are having trouble accessing Messenger, Workplace Chat and Instagram DMs. We’re working to get things back to normal as quickly as possible and we apologize for any inconvenience,” a spokeswoman said. Workplace Chat is a tool for companies that lets workers communicate and collaborate with each other, akin to the enterprise functionality for Slack Technologies.
